job.title: Data & Applied Scientist
job.industry: Computer Hardware,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description: Microsofts mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more We are building the Developer Relations Content amp Learning dream team Our global team is maniacal about making the world amazing for developers admins citizen developers students and other technical roles coming from all backgrounds Were excited to support and contribute to opensource platforms tools events and processes Were spreading awareness of Microsoft technology and enabling our current and future customers to do what they love write code and learn This is the heart and soul of reinventing Microsofts relationship with our technical communitiesbrbrWe are looking for a motivated data scientist to join our data science team  insights and intelligence team In this role you will have ownership of highvisibility initiatives across our portfolio and will lead the generation of insights that drive our business Expect to work with a host of engaged stakeholders who value your skills and consider you thought partners in driving the businessbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliPartner with stakeholders to define and execute the critical insights required to make informed business decisionsliliBe a handson technical lead who can own drive and develop insights from conception to releaseliliAct as a catalyst for insights innovation aligned to both tactical and strategic business insights effortsliliOversee the design of the data and technical architecture that ensures integrity and accuracy of dataliliDesign build and maintain all business reporting and dashboardsliliDrive customer and business insights with focus and speed to enable the business to make timely business decisionliliManipulate and analyze complex highvolume highdimensionality data from various sources using a variety of tools and data analysis techniquesbrliulstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongstrongRequired Qualificationsbrstrongulli5 years of experience in data science modeling statistics analytics business intelligence or datadriven business strategylili3 years experience in SQL R or Python to implement statistical models machine learning and analysis prediction classification clustering time series forecasting regression models etclili3 years of experience in reporting tools such as Power BI Tableau Excel etcliliBachelors degree or higher in an analytical area such as Computer Science Management information Systems Mathematics Statistics or similar field uOR Equivalent work 5 years experiencebrstronguPreferred QualificationsbrustrongulliExperience analytics experienceliliDemonstrated stakeholder management ability including effective prioritization clear and concise communication and delivery of actionable datadriven insightsliliAdvanced degree in quantitative fieldbrliuldevrelawesomejobsbrbrstronguRequirementsbrbrustrongThese requirements include but are not limited to the following specialized security screeningsbrbrAbility to meet
